page.title: 08WILLESDEN SPORTS CENTRE
page.content: {Willesden Sports Centre}is a developing concern. At present, it consists of baths with facilities for indoor or outdoor swimming and diving. There is a stadium which has just had a new omniturf surface laid in preparation for the{1986 World Hockey {Championships.}It is also used throughout the year by clubs and schools. Coaching is given for many sports during term time and special holiday sessions are provided. In the summer months the stadium is used for a display of country dancing given by many Junior schools from the borough. At present, a new development is underway which will provide squash courts for the centre.The small gymnasium offers a chance for Keep-fit sessions for those who wish to shed those extra pounds.
